body_html: @fmassa I've seen some changes in the running time, but they probably can be partially attributed to version update (0.4.0->0.5.0a). GPU memory usage is unchanged, while RAM usage seems to increase, but I am not sure about it. I'll try to do more extensive testing as soon as current run is finished (a day or two probably).
